message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $135.  I think that's a fair price considering the value you'll get out of it.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $135, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
